It was late afternoon when I checked into my hotel and dropped off my bags New York is a great walking city and nothing encourages that more than a hotel room the size of a pine cone
The streets were colorful as always and Halloween hits hit the city have you ever complimented someone costume and realized he was just a New Yorker wears a milk carton is a hat
Walked into Washington Square park and sat on a bench near a dog run there is nothing crazier than in New York dog park
These are not dogs that are used to the freedom of backyard and rolling hills these are pets that have been locked indoors for hours drinking coffee trying not to be on the New York post
When they finally get to the dog park they lose their minds
I sat next to one of the dog owners musician named Dave even though he wasn't sweat pants has long hair and cool Jean jacket that he was a rocker his dog look cool to he was a mutt named Rocco with a spike collar and an upper lip and permanent snarl
